articles.title: Lance Bass welcomes twins Violet Betty and Alexander James via surrogate - Daily Mail
articles.description: Lance Bass and husband Michael Turchin have welcomed their twin children via surrogate on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Lance Bass and husband Michael Turchin have welcomed their twin children via surrogate on Wednesday.
The 42-year-old N'Sync singer and his husband of nearly seven years Turchin welcomed twins Violet… [+2969 chars]
